Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Lip Balm

Introducing the Apple Martini Pout Polish Peptide Lip Treatment Balm ‚Äì your newest obsession and the ultimate fusion of skincare and makeup. This innovative balm combines the hydration of a lip mask, the shine of a lip glaze, and the power of advanced skincare ‚Äî all packed into one sleek tube.

Scented like a refreshing apple martini, this variant adds a playful twist to your routine. The balm starts off as a vibrant green but transforms into a unique pink tint upon contact with your lips, thanks to its pH-reactive formula. The result? A flattering, custom pink hue that stays put all day long ‚Äî no touch-ups needed.

Formulated in Italy, it features highly targeted lip peptides that help reduce fine lines and wrinkles over time, while collagen boosts fullness and lip rejuvenation. Enriched with brightening ingredients, it‚Äôs also ideal for restoring natural lip color and treating darkened lips.

Our¬†moisture-lock technology creates a protective barrier that keeps lips deeply hydrated for up to 8 hours, while the metal-tip applicator delivers a cooling experience with every swipe. Lightweight, non-sticky, and pocket-sized, it‚Äôs perfect for that juicy, high-shine glazed lip look ‚Äî anytime, anywhere.

What makes this lip balm so good?

  • pH-Activated Color Change: Goes on green, turns into your perfect pink tint that lasts all day
  • Metal Tip Applicator: Gives a refreshing, cooling experience with every swipe
  • Triple Action Formula: Hydrates like a mask, shines like a glaze, nourishes like a treatment balm

  • Comfortable, Lightweight Formula: Cushions lips in smooth, bouncy moisture that wears comfortable all day

Typsy Beauty‚Äôs modern take on the classic matte bullet lipstick ‚Äî made for all the matte-lover who crave for more!

We‚Äôve taken everything you love about a traditional matte lipstick ‚Äî the bold pigment, full coverage, and intense color payoff ‚Äî and gave it a major upgrade. Our soft-blur, velvet-matte formula is powered by Cocoa Peptide, a next-gen ingredient that hydrates, smooths, and plumps with every swipe. The result? Plush, chocolate-scented lips that feel as good as they look. No dry looking lips. No flat finishes.

Powered by the nourishing strength of cocoa, our advanced Cocoa Peptide blend boosts collagen for plumper, smoother lips, deeply hydrates with rich fatty acids and antioxidants, and naturally enhances softness and volume. It also works to restore and repair, healing dryness and cracks over time ‚Äî so your lips feel as good as they look.

With Cocoa Peptide Velvet Lipstick, we‚Äôve made finding your perfect color effortless and inclusive. Our unique shade library is built around three universally flattering color families ‚Äî Pink, Mauve, and Brown ‚Äî each thoughtfully designed in Light, Medium, and Deep tones to suit every skin tone and undertone. No more guesswork ‚Äî just plush, flattering color made to match your mood, your tone, and your style.

entry.title: On & Off Lipstick + Eraser Combo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Lipstick
Price: 1570.00

A combo containing any 2 shades of your choice of the On & Off Lipstick + Eraser

Love long stay lipsticks but find removing them a pain? We have just the solution for you - introducing Typsy Beauty‚Äôs latest innovation - On & Off - a long stay, featherlight liquid matte lipstick with a custom eraser that‚Äôs charged with nourishing superfoods leaving your lips a supple and moisturized even after a full day of wear.

On Side (Lipstick):

We're passionate about liquid lipsticks here at Typsy, but we've always struggled with the cakey feel and emphasized lines they can leave behind. That's why we dedicated the past 13 months to perfecting a formula that's weightless, comfortable, and blurring.

The buttery formula is kiss-proof, food-proof and transfer-proof, only coming off when you want it to, & will endure anything from the messiest meal to the most passionate kiss without smudging, flaking or transferring.

This good-for-lips formula comes nutrient-packed with a nourishing blend of Raspberry Stem Cells, Argan oil, Cocoa Butter & Hyaluronic Acid for upto 12 hours of intense colour, comfort and hydration.

Off Side (Oil):

Tired of scrubbing and tugging your lips to get your lipstick out? Flip over to the ‚ÄòOFF‚Äô side - featuring a gentle yet effective eraser that melts away any long-wear lipstick in just one swipe.

Supercharged with skin-loving ingredients such as Green Tea Leaf Extract, Jojoba Oil, Cherry Blossom Extract, Cocoa Butter & Vitamin E, the eraser removes the lipstick without rubbing while nourishing lips. Can be used as an overnight lip mask for extra care & hydration.

What makes it so goood?

Lipstick:

  • Lightweight, long-stay liquid matte lipstick with one-stroke intensity
  • Developed using ColourLock Technology for upto 12 hours of stay
  • Adds a soft-focus blurring effect on lips to minimize visible lines
  • Supercharged with skin-loving ingredients - Raspberry Stem Cells, Cocoa Butter & Hyaluronic Acid
  • Velvety whipped formula that feels comfortable and non-drying on lips
  • Mask-proof, water-proof, kiss-proof & food-proof

Eraser:

  • 2-in-1 lipstick remover + nourishing lip oil
  • Removes all signs of stubborn, long-staying lipsticks in just one swipe
  • Enriched with lip-loving ingredients - Green Tea Leaf Extract, Jojoba Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Cherry Blossom Extract & Vitamin E
  • Leave on as a hydrating lip mask

entry.title: Shade Shifter Lip Oil Combo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Lip Oil
Price: 1799.00

A combo containing any 2 shades from the Shade Shifter Collection

Shade Shifter Sparkle: A range of glitter pH reactive lip oils from the iconic Shade Shifter collection. It delivers the same colour-changing, long lasting tint, but with a dazzling sparkle. Available in 3 juicy shades, this ultra hydrating formula glimmers with glitter particles to unveil smooth, high-shine, irresistible lips. Our iconic doe-foot applicator hugs lips for easy glide- on application that leaves lips feeling cocooned with vibrant shine. Experience a 99% natural formula powered by Rosehip & Jojoba Oil, Shea Butter and Peach Extract for more hydration and collagen boost.

Shade Shifter Lip and Cheek Oil Ph-enomenal 01: color-changing lip and cheek oil, a marvel in the realm of custom cosmetics. Thanks to its innovative pH-reactive formula, this revolutionary product provides a personalized tint, perfectly tailored to complement every skin tone and type. Infused with nourishing Acai Berry and Hibiscus oil, it provides the utmost hydration, reviving dry and chapped lips while simultaneously giving your cheeks a naturally flushed look and a dewy radiance. Experience a dual-benefit with a sheer, glossy, mirror-like shine for your lips and a luminous, dewy glow for your cheeks. Discover the magic and transform your beauty routine!

Shade Shifter Lip and Cheek Oil Midnight: a sparking new variant - Midnight 02 - a black cheek and lip oil that shifts to a custom berry-pink shade. This universally flattering, 2-in-1 multifunctional pH-powered lip & cheek tint shifts like magic into a custom berry-pink shade, while drenching skin in lasting non-sticky, juicy colour and shine. Infused with Goji Berry and Blackberry, the Shade Shifter Midnight instantly nourishes, hydrates and soothes lips and gives a dewy, my-skin-but-better natural flush on the cheeks. Never heavy or sticky, this weightless formula borrows from the best of both gloss and balm worlds.
